    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="fr">Test de présence d'amidon dans une feuille de plante</string>
            <string language="en">Testing presence of starch in a plant leaf</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Prüfenvorhandensein der Stärke in einem 
Betriebsblatt</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Presença testando do starch em uma folha da 
planta</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Presenza difficile di amido in un foglio della 
pianta</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εξεταστική παρουσία αμύλου σε ένα φύλλο φυτών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Presencia de prueba del almidón en una hoja de 
la planta</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">La première dans une série de quatre illustrations montrant une expérience pour tester la présence d'amidon dans une feuille de plante. Montrée ici est une feuille submergée dans de l'eau  bouillante.</string>
            <string language="en">First in a series of four illustrations showing an experiment to test the presence of starch in a plant leaf. Shown here is a leaf submerged in boiling water.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">ébullition</string>
            <string language="en">boiling</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">expérience</string>
            <string language="en">experiment</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">nourriture</string>
            <string language="en">food</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">feuilles</string>
            <string language="en">leaves</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">plantes</string>
            <string language="en">Plants</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">amidon</string>
            <string language="en">starch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">eau</string>
            <string language="en">water</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zuerst in einer Reihe von vier Abbildungen, die 
ein Experiment zeigen, um das Vorhandensein der Stärke in einem 
Betriebsblatt zu prüfen. Hier gezeigt ein Blatt, das in 
kochendes Wasser versenkt wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Primeiramente em uma série de quatro 
ilustrações que mostram uma experiência para testar a presença do 
starch em uma folha da planta. É mostrada aqui uma folha 
submersa na água fervendo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Primo di una serie di quattro illustrazioni che 
mostrano un esperimento per verificare la presenza di amido in un 
foglio della pianta. È indicato qui un foglio sommerso in acqua
di ebollizione.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πρώτα σε μία σειρά τεσσάρων απεικονίσεων που 
εμφανίζουν ένα πείραμα για να εξετάσει την παρουσία αμύλου σε 
ένα φύλλο φυτών. Εμφανισμένο εδώ είναι ένα φύλλο που 
καταδύεται στο βράζοντας ύδωρ.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Primero en una serie de cuatro ilustraciones que 
muestran un experimento para probar la presencia del almidón en una 
hoja de la planta. Se muestra aquí una hoja sumergida en agua 
hirvienda.</string>
          </description>
